attributes.action: stop the use of bills of sale by money lenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the goverment put a stop to the use of money lending organisations securing credit on peoples vehicles by using a bill of sale. The use of this legislation gives the consumer no rights and allows the lender to take a veh with no court order.I belive that this is an abuse of the legislation.
